duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversight and management of MDOT MTA Light Rail and Metro program schedules.
Development and implementation of a 5-year program schedule for Metro and Light Rail Infrastructure and Equipment projects.
Coordination with the 6-year Consolidated Transportation Program.
Guidance and support in program project-level Planning activities.
Assisting in the development of KPI measurements to analyze schedule management for areas of improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Transportation Studies, Engineering, Planning, or a closely related field (Master's preferred)
